name: hex-battle-game
description: A GameFi dApp that allows players to compete with capture the most cells on an hex battlefield.

scripts.gh-pages: gh-pages -d dist -r $(git remote get-url gh-pages) -b main -m "deploy ref:$(git log -n 1 --pretty=format:%h)"
scripts.build-asset: pwa-asset-generator src/asset/logo.svg public --favicon --type png --padding 0 --background transparent --opaque false --log false
scripts.build-app-v1-web: mkdir -p dist/v1 && cd src/app-v1 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/v1/
scripts.build-app-v1: npm run build-app-v1-web && mv dist/v1/*.wasm dist
scripts.build-app-v2: rm -fr dist && mkdir -p dist && cd src/app-v2 && npm run build && cp -r dist/* ../../dist/

author: hex-battle-game
